model

Interface IGameLogic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameLogic

    public interface IGameLogic
    Represents the complete game logic.
    Author:
    eriveros

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToDrawWell(int number)
      Adds cards to the draw well.
      void announceWinner(IController ctrl)
      Announces the winner of the game, if there's any.
      void autoShoutUNO(IController ctrl)
      Allows to autoshout UNO if a player has only one card.
      void drawCardsFromWell(IPlayer player, IController ctrl)
      Draws cards from well and announces it to the controller.

      Draws one card from the deck.

      Returns the current played card.

      Returns true if the game has ended.

      Inverts the direction of the game
      boolean isDrawWellEmpty()
      Returns true if the draw well is empty.

      Plays a card, executing its action and putting it in the discard pile.

      Sets the number of cards in the draw well to zero.
      void setCurrentPlayedCard(ICard card) 
      void skipPlayer()
      Skips the next player's turn.
      void startTurn(IController ctrl)
      Prepares the turn to be initiated, changing the actual player, shouting UNO automatically, assigning cards to players if the Draw Well is not empty

    • Method Detail

      • hasEnded

        boolean hasEnded()
        Returns true if the game has ended. False otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if game has ended.

      • autoShoutUNO

        void autoShoutUNO(IController ctrl)
        Allows to autoshout UNO if a player has only one card.
        Parameters:
        ctrl - Controller used by the game.

      • startTurn

        void startTurn(IController ctrl)
        Prepares the turn to be initiated, changing the actual player, shouting UNO automatically, assigning cards to players if the Draw Well is not empty
        Parameters:
        ctrl - Controller used by the game.

      • skipPlayer

        void skipPlayer()
        Skips the next player's turn.

      • addToDrawWell

        void addToDrawWell(int number)
        Adds cards to the draw well.
        Parameters:
        number - of cards to add to the draw well

      • resetDrawWell

        void resetDrawWell()
        Sets the number of cards in the draw well to zero.

      • isDrawWellEmpty

        boolean isDrawWellEmpty()
        Returns true if the draw well is empty.

      • drawCardsFromWell

        void drawCardsFromWell(IPlayer player,
                       IController ctrl)
        Draws cards from well and announces it to the controller.
        Parameters:
        player - player which is drawing the cards
        ctrl - controller used by the game.

      • invertDirection

        void invertDirection()
        Inverts the direction of the game

      • playCard

        boolean playCard(ICard playedCard,
                 IController ctrl)
        Plays a card, executing its action and putting it in the discard pile.
        Parameters:
        playedCard - card played by the player.
        ctrl - controller of the game
        Returns:
        true if the card was played.
